name: Blissey
author: Yuka Morii
flavor_text: Anyone who takes even one bite of Blissey’s egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.

abilities.name: Softboiled
abilities.effect: When you play Blissey from your hand, you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 8 damage counters from Blissey. If tails, remove 4 damage counters from Blissey. Either way, if Blissey has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
